data.description:
[ALPHA]
Step into the ultimate futuristic battleground with our mixed reality multiplayer PvP shooter game. Experience the thrill of combat in a world where reality meets sci-fi, offering an unparalleled gaming adventure.

Game Modes:
Forge: Collaborate with friends to build and customize maps anywhere you choose. The only limit is your imagination!

Player vs. Player: Dive into heart-pounding 2-minute shooting matches. Choose your loadout, select a map, and engage in fast-paced PvP action in your chosen playspace. Prove your skills and dominate the leaderboard!

Survival Mode (Coming Soon): Prepare for an epic battle against interdimensional beings in Survival mode. Face relentless waves of enemies emerging from portals all around you. Survive as long as you can in this intense fight for survival.

Features:
Gear Upgrades: Customize and upgrade your gear to suit your playstyle. Enhance your weapons, armor, and abilities to gain the upper hand in battle.

Leveling Up: Earn experience points through gameplay to level up your character. Unlock new abilities, gear, and customization options as you progress.

Career Stats: Track your progress with detailed career stats. Monitor your victories, improvements, and overall performance to become the ultimate warrior.

Are you ready to step into a world where the future and reality collide? Join the fight, build your legacy, and conquer the universe in our Mixed Reality multiplayer PvP shooter. The battleground awaits you!
